sense.def:
To straggle somewhere
pomeni nekam se počasi pomakniti v nepravilnih, neorganiziranih skupinah.

seg.quote: The players straggled across the field.

sense.def:
Kadar stvari
straggle over an area
, v neredu prekrivajo neko območje.

seg.quote: The shacks straggle along the dirt road.
...her hair straggling down over her eyes.
